com.davidsoergel.dsutils
Interface GenericFactory<T>

public interface GenericFactory<T>

A Factory that creates objects of type T, using whatever constructor arguments might be needed.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
David Soergel

Method Summary
 T create(Object... constructorArguments)
          Creates a new object of the type appropriate for this factory.
 Class getCreatesClass()
          Returns the class which this factory creates.
 

Method Detail

create

T create(Object... constructorArguments)
         throws GenericFactoryException
Creates a new object of the type appropriate for this factory.

Parameters:
constructorArguments - arguments to be passed to the constructor
Returns:
the newly instantiated object
Throws:
GenericFactoryException - if no constructor matching the arguments is found

getCreatesClass

Class getCreatesClass()
Returns the class which this factory creates. This may be different from the generic type T, which may itself have type parameters. Here we get only the raw class. This information should also be extractable from instances implementing this interface, but that's a complicated reflection exercise which this method avoids.

Returns:
the class which this factory creates.
